==============
Questions & Answers
==============
Where are your servers located?
In Chicago, IL at SingleHop (DC2).

How many VM's are deployed per node?
We never oversell! If we deploy a node with (2X) Xeon E5520 and 24GB of RAM, we'd simply place 24 '1GB VPSes' on the node, 48 '512MB VPSes' or any combination of our VPS plans that allow each and every VM the ability to 100% of it's allocated resources.

What kind of servers power your VPS nodes?
We only utilize single and dual CPU Intel Xeon's with 12-24GB of RAM. We use powerful machines but place less clients on each physical node for increased performance and reliability.

Do these VPSes come with a control panel?
Absolutely! We'll give you access to a control panel in which you can perform basic VPS functions by yourself, eliminating the need to contact support for basic issues. View screencap here: https://www.surmounted.net/vpspanel.PNG

Do you provide free basic management?
We do provide basic server management for free. We'll get you set up and ready to go initially, and will maintain the host node for optimal server performance. This is ideal for those who know what they're doing or are using a control panel such as cPanel/WHM to manage their server. We also offer a fully managed service for those who require it.

Whats the deal with this unlimited free 256-bit GloablSign SSL Certificate offer?
We obtain 256-bit GlobalSign SSL Certificates for free, so instead of trying to sell them to you between $10-$40/YR as they're averagely priced, we decided to just give them to our clients! You can pass these on to your client-base, can resell them for profit, whatever you wish. Whats the catch? They must be used on our IP range and on our servers.

Money Back Guarantee?
We offer a 7-Day Money Back Guarantee on all of our VPS services. We believe this is long enough for most people to get 'settled in' into their new VPS, and is adequate length of time to be able to thoroughly test VPS performance and compare to your standards. If we, for whatever reason, fall below your standards as a VPS provider we will happily refund your money.

What Operating Systems do you support?
We use the standard and highly support Linux Distros such as CentOS (32/64bit) Debian (32/64bit), RHEL (32/64bit), & Ubuntu (32/64bit). We do not support Windows at this time.

Can I have a custom VPS?
Absolutely! Just open a Ticket with sales and list your needs. We can deploy VMs larger than advertised on our website, ranging in size from 6GB-24GB of RAM, increased CPU priority (or in some cases, fully dedicated CPU (all cores), and your choice of local or Cloud Storage; as much as you need. Hit us up today and we'll give you a generous offer based on your needs!


Questions? Comments?
Feel free to send us an email to sales[AT]surmounted.net with any questions or concerns you may have.
